body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

I am trying to update the vendor directory by following the instructions here: https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/godep.md.

When I run `./hack/godep-save.sh`, an extra directory is pulled:

```
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

	vendor/github.com/docker/docker/project/
````

This directory contains a `CONTRIBUTORS.md` which contains a symlink -  `../CONTRIBUTING.md`. 

Due to this, running `./hack/update-bazel.sh` panics:

```
F0707 12:15:44.993342    5803 gazel.go:54] err walking vendor: stat vendor/github.com/docker/docker/project/CONTRIBUTORS.md: no such file or directory
goroutine 1 [running]:
gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog.stacks(0xc420612b00, 0xc42062fb30, 0x97, 0xeb)
	/home/nikhita/code/kubernetes/src/gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:766 +0xa7
gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog.(*loggingT).output(0x6c05a0, 0xc400000003, 0xc420014f20, 0x6a262b, 0x8, 0x36, 0x0)
	/home/nikhita/code/kubernetes/src/gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:717 +0x348
gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog.(*loggingT).printf(0x6c05a0, 0xc400000003, 0x5dd1e2, 0x16, 0xc4200fbf38, 0x1, 0x1)
	/home/nikhita/code/kubernetes/src/gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:655 +0x14f
gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog.Fatalf(0x5dd1e2, 0x16, 0xc4200fbf38, 0x1, 0x1)
	/home/nikhita/code/kubernetes/src/gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/vendor/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:1145 +0x67
main.main()
	/home/nikhita/code/kubernetes/src/gopkg.in/mikedanese/gazel.v17/gazel/gazel.go:54 +0x2cd
!!! Error in ./hack/update-bazel.sh:40
  Error in ./hack/update-bazel.sh:40. '"${gazel}" -root="$(kube::realpath ${KUBE_ROOT})"' exited with status 255
Call stack:
  1: ./hack/update-bazel.sh:40 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
```

Related Links:

- https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42967#issuecomment-288593136
- https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/35356#issuecomment-258054506
- https://github.com/tools/godep/pull/522
- https://github.com/moby/moby/pull/31847


**What you expected to happen**:
The extra directory should not be pulled down after running `./hack/godep-save.sh`.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

By running `./hack/godep-save.sh`.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8+", GitVersion:"v1.8.0-alpha.0.823+a57c33bd281732", GitCommit:"a57c33bd2817323806b97da5c2f848108f7403d8", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-06-19T02:15:29Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): 

```
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="14.04.4 LTS, Trusty Tahr"
```
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

godep version:

```
godep v79 (linux/amd64/go1.8.1)
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Indicates an issue or PR lacks a `sig/foo` label and requires one.
labels.name: needs-sig

title: hack/godep-save.sh pulls down docker/docker/project dir
